content: He is still campaigning. Every time he picks up a pen or the phone he has the media there to document what a wonder job he is doing. Well, Now it's let's get out of Afganastan. We just tuck our tails between out legs and scamper out of there, More lives lost for what? It is time the US started worrying about our own interests in the world and not be concerned about what the other countries think or want. After all we are the big dawg on the block, so let's start acting like it. AShau Valley 101 68-70
